CustomerName is required.
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { ActivatedRoute, Router } from '@angular/router'; import { Customer } from '../customer'; import { FormGroup, FormControl, Validators} from '@angular/forms'; @Component({ selector: 'app-edit', templateUrl: './edit.component.html', styleUrls: ['./edit.component.css'] }) export class EditComponent { }
